title: Sparkling swimming pool, Siegel Rewards Program, BBQ area and gazebo
posting_body: ['Bonanza Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-No long term lease required', '-Large studio apartments', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Free utilities included', '-Elevator to upper level apartments', '-Fully furnished and unfurnished apartments', '-BBQ area and gazebo', '-On Las Vegas CAT bus line', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
